grc.title: GRC Cybersecurity - AgileVizion
grc.hero_h1: ‚Ç¨10 million fine or 2% of revenue ‚Äî and that's just NIS 2
grc.hero_p1: DORA, NIS 2, ISO 27001, GDPR... A new requirement every month?
grc.hero_p2: Want to know where you stand before the regulator does?
grc.banner_text: I help organisations achieve compliance with the regulatory framework for cybersecurity
grc.problem_1: Which standards actually apply to my organisation?
grc.problem_3: How can I audit without tying up my team for months?
grc.problem_4: What if I miss something that exposes the company?
grc.approach_1_text: I identify which standards genuinely apply to your context ‚Äî no unnecessary over-compliance
grc.approach_2_text: Structured methodology with professional deliverables and a clear timeline
grc.approach_3_text: Workload for your teams, clear milestones, zero surprises
grc.deliverable_1_text: 100 to 160+ control points per standard, aligned with official texts
grc.deliverable_2_text: Clear summary for management + detailed analysis for technical teams
grc.deliverable_3_text: Actions ranked by criticality, effort and impact ‚Äî ready to execute
grc.deliverable_4_text: Formal closing document, signed by all parties
grc.deliverable_5_text: Engagement letters, non-conformity sheets, registers, RACI matrices
grc.deliverable_6_text: Visual overview to understand the framework architecture
grc.frameworks_subtitle: Complete audit kits, tested and ready to use for each framework
grc.cta_title: Ready to get clarity on your compliance?
grc.cta_subtitle: 30-minute initial call to identify your priorities ‚Äî free, no commitment

itsm.title: IT Service Management - AgileVizion
itsm.hero_h1: Are your ITSM processes based on habits rather than standards?
itsm.hero_sub1: Your IT teams are skilled, but everyone works in their own way?
itsm.hero_sub2: You have the tools ‚Äî you're missing the methodology?
itsm.banner_text: I help organisations structure their IT services according to ITIL 4 and ISO 20000 standards
itsm.problem_1_text: Your team fights the same fires every week without understanding the root cause. Time and money evaporate.
itsm.problem_2_text: Deadlines slip, customers are unhappy, and your reputation takes a hit.
itsm.problem_3_text: Your infrastructure data is outdated or non-existent. Impossible to make informed decisions.
itsm.problem_4_text: Every update becomes stressful. No clear process, no plan B.
itsm.problem_5_text: You don't know where your IT budget goes or how to optimise your investments.
itsm.problem_6_text: Your technicians are drowning in tickets without efficient tools or processes.
itsm.approach_1_text: I evaluate your ITSM maturity and measure the gap with ISO 20000 ‚Äî you know where you stand
itsm.approach_2_text: We define together what you want to achieve ‚Äî not necessarily everything, just what matters to you
itsm.approach_3_text: I support you on the action plan: processes, tools, teams ‚Äî until you're autonomous
itsm.deliverable_1_text: SMS policy, RACI matrix, formalised scope
itsm.deliverable_4_text: ServiceNow, Jira SM or your tool ‚Äî operational
itsm.also_text: Also: Release, Capacity, Continuity, Supplier Management‚Ä¶ as needed.
itsm.cta_title: Ready to structure your IT services?

why.title: Why me - AgileVizion
why.hero_h1: Why me instead of a Big 4?
why.hero_subtitle: Same expertise level, budget under control
why.arg_1_text: Tested audit kits, proven methodology, turnkey deliverables ‚Äî I don't reinvent the wheel on your budget
why.arg_2_text: I do the work myself. No junior learning on your dime, no turnover mid-project
why.arg_3_text: No Big 4 day rates, no surprises. We agree on the budget together before starting
why.arg_4_text: From assessment to deliverable, it's me from start to finish
why.arg_5_text: DORA, NIS 2, ISO 27001, GDPR ‚Äî one methodology, all regulations covered
why.arg_6_text: One month of follow-up included after delivery. 24-hour response to all your questions
why.profile_years: 20 years at the crossroads of technology, law and business.
why.profile_desc: What's rare isn't having these skills ‚Äî it's making them work together. I understand your technical constraints, your legal obligations AND your business challenges. No translator needed.
why.cta_subtitle: 30 minutes to understand your situation and see if we can work together
